data.title: Bethany Joy Lenz: Wiki, Net Worth, Wife, Weight
data.meta_description: Diva Bethany Joy Lenz is an accomplished actress. She has appeared in major television series such as One Tree Hill. What is Bethany Joy Lenz's net worth?
data.text:
Diva Bethany Joy Lenz is an accomplished actress. She has appeared in major television series such as One Tree Hill.

What is Bethany Joy Lenzâ€™s net worth? Salary, Earnings

As of February 2023, he had a staggering net worth of $6 million, proving the success he had had in his line of work. His main source of income comes from his work in television shows and movies. She played the lead role in the movie Thinner. The film received a rating of 5.7 on IMDb.

The film cost $14 million and grossed $15.3 million at the box office. She can also be seen in the movie Extortion. The film received a 6.2 on IMDb. The film received 4.5 out of 5 stars from That Moment In.

Is Bethany Joy Lenz single? Relationship

His personal life has had many ups and downs. She and Michael Galeotti divorced her husband. Six years after marrying in 2005, the couple divorced. Her daughter with Michael is called Maria Rose Galeotti. In the interest of raising her son, she has said that she will maintain her friendship with her ex-husband. She currently resides in Los Angeles with her daughter.

How did Bethany Joy Lenz begin her professional career?

She was excellent as Cassie Jollenston in Dexter. She is the star of this show and previously played Keri Allen on Pearson. As Haley James Scott in One Tree Hill, she was fantastic.
